facts.text: I change my outfit as I grow up! My color patterns look completely different when I'm a baby versus an adult.
Mom and Dad work together to raise us! Both my parents guard our eggs and take turns fanning them with their fins.
I come from the Amazon rainforest! I live in flooded areas with lots of plants to hide in.
My triangle shape helps me hide among tall water plants. Predators have trouble spotting me!
When I find a partner, we stay together! Angelfish couples form strong bonds and defend their territory together.
